resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103863</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103863</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209769</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Astronomy Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet d'Astronomie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto Da Astronomia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto Di Astronomia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα αστρονομίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto De la Astronomía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This learning project offers learnings activities that allow Wikiversity participants to learn astronomy "on the job" by participating in analysis of astronomical observations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses erlernenprojekt bietet learnings 
Aktivitäten an, die Wikiversity Teilnehmern erlauben, Astronomie "auf
dem Job" zu erlernen, indem sie an der Analyse der astronomischen 
Beobachtungen teilnehmen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce projet d'étude offre les activités de 
learnings qui permettent à des participants de Wikiversity 
d'apprendre l'astronomie "sur le travail" en participant à l'analyse 
des observations astronomiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este projeto de aprendizagem oferece as atividades
dos learnings que permitem que os participants de Wikiversity aprendam
a astronomia "no trabalho" participando na análise de observações 
astronômicas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo progetto imparante offre le attività di 
learnings che permettono che i partecipanti di Wikiversity imparino 
l'astronomia "sul lavoro" partecipando all'analisi delle osservazioni 
astronomiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το πρόγραμμα εκμάθησης προσφέρει τις 
δραστηριότητες εκμαθήσεων που επιτρέπουν στους συμμετέχοντες 
Wikiversity για να μάθουν την αστρονομία "στην εργασία" με τη 
συμμετοχή στην ανάλυση των αστρονομικών παρατηρήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este proyecto que aprende ofrece las actividades 
de los learnings que permiten que los participantes de Wikiversity 
aprendan astronomía "en el trabajo" participando en el análisis de 
observaciones astronómicas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209769</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">GNU Free Documentation License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103863</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/astronomy-project</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
